message.text: Your account is not activated yet. Please click on link from confirmation message to activate your account.
Your account is not activated yet. We sent again confirmation e-mail, so please click on link in it to activate your account.
Sorry, I cannot get list of changes for this fragment.
Check is successful. Please wait a few seconds while page will load.
Element with ID %s is not found.

E-mail is required to be sure that you is you. Also it's required to get password if you'll forget it. And we also very want to have a possibility to contact with you, if something important will happen (there is no SPAM!). Specify your e-mail, please.
E-mail change confirmation on a web-site
Thank you! E-mail change is confirmed.

Hello, %s!

 You've changed your e-mail on web-site '%s'
 Please click the following link to confirm the change:
 %s

 If you didn't ask to send this e-mail to you, please sorry that you get it.
 It seems that someone has used your e-mail on web site %s
 Please contact us if this issue will repeat.

 Best regards,
 Support team
Wrong e-mail change confirmation code specified.
If you'll not specify your e-mail we'll not be able to send you your password.
There is an error in your e-mail. Wants something like email@server.com
You should enter login and password to access this page.
File is not set for media block.
If you forget your login or password, please enter e-mail you used on registration. We'll send a new password via e-mail.
If you forget your login or password, it's always possible to recover it.
Date of the last request is not specified.
Someone with login specified is already registered. If it's you, please specify password you used first time and continue registration.
Specified login is already in use on the site.
You can use A-Z, a-z letters and 0-9 digits for login.
We very want to know your name. Please specify it.

Hello, %s!

 You asked to send you a new password on web-site '%s'

 Your login: %s
 Your new password: %s

 Use these login and password to enter the web-site
 %s

 You can change your new password on your account page:
 %s

 If you didn't ask to send this e-mail to you, please sorry that you get it.
 It seems that someone has used your e-mail on web site %s
 Please contact us if this issue will repeat.

 Best regards,
 Support team
If you want to change your password, please specify the old one. It's an additional check that you is you.
We sent you an e-mail with new password.
There is no admin. Please choose one.
It seems that nothing is changed.
If you'd not registered on the site you can do it right now.
Password cannot be empty. If you'll not specify the password anyone will be able to pass oneself off as you.

Hello, %s!

 Thank you so much for registration on web-site '%s'!
 Your login: %s
 Your password: %s

 Please click on the following link to activate your account:
 %s

 If you didn't ask to send this e-mail to you, please sorry that you get it.
 It seems that someone has used your e-mail on web site %s
 Please contact us if this issue will repeat.

 Best regards,
 Support team
Activation e-mail was not deliverd. Please try again.
Registration successful! We sent you a confirmation e-mail. Please click on link in the e-mail to confirm your account.
We don't recognize you. It seems that session is expired.
Problems with network. Try again later.
Please specify your login and password to relogin and save again.
Our support team is already got the notification and will fix the issue as soon as possible.
There are no accounts with e-mail specified.
To change you password please enter the old and a new one
%1 %3 saved new version of content you're editing

locale.message:
Wiki-syntax

Links: in any place of text:

  • @page "Page title"—link to the wiki page.
  • @page[Page title] "link text"—link to the wiki page with specified link text.
  • @page[URL] "link text"—link to an outside URL.

Prefixes of block types: use it on line begin
before text to change block type:

  • @title—title;
  • @subtitle—subtitle;
  • @subsubtitle—sub-subtitle;
  • @par—just a text;
  • @listitem—list;
  • @footnote—footnote;
  • @quote—quotation;
  • @img url—image from url.
  • @html ... any HTML code.

Additional layout: in any place of text:

  • *bold*—for bold;
  • /italic/—for italic;
  • ^superscript^—for superscript;
  • _subscript_—for subscript.

message.text: You have no permissions to access this wiki page.
